ru: Стоя на носке опорной стопы, поднимите колено.
en: Balance on the ball of your standing foot while lifting your knee.

ru: Согнутое колено поднимите выше тазобедренного сустава.
en: Lift your bent knee above hip height, keeping your torso steady as you hold the position.

ru: Сохраняя стойку на опорном носке, выведите колено другой ноги в сторону.

en: Stretch your leg outward to the side as you exhale smoothly, pressing firmly through the sole of your foot and reaching through your toes to create a long, steady line from hip to heel, aligning your hips square and keeping your core engaged while you hold the position with stability.
